nodes.text: Star Wars Adventures 21 is the twenty-first issue of the canon comic book anthology series Star Wars Adventures. It is comprised of the stories "Swoop Racers," by Cavan Scott, and "Tales from Wild Space: The Heist," by Shane McCarthy. The issue was published on May 8, 2019 by IDW Publishing.
Not ones to rest on their laurels, Han and Luke embark on a mission to secure equipment for the fledgling rebellion in this exciting tale set just after A New Hope!
